title: Design, synthesis, and anticancer evaluation of novel coumarin/thiazole congeners as potential CDK2 inhibitors with molecular dynamics
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18838-18855
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02456G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Samir Bondock, Nada Alabbad, Aisha Hossan, Moaz M. Abdou, Ali A. Shati, Mohammad Y. Alfaifi, Serag E. I. Elbehairi, Nada M. Mohamed
A series of novel coumarin–thiazoles was designed and synthesized as a possible CDK2 inhibitor with anticancer activity with low toxicity.
